rows.label: tev066101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev066101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask De Ezich about the other Wrothians.

rows.label: tev066101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev066101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask De Ezich about recent developments.

rows.label: tev066101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask De Ezich about the Wrothians.

rows.label: tev066101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask De Ezich about recent developments.

rows.label: tev066101_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask De Ezich about life in New LA.

rows.label: tev066101_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask De Ezich about recent developments.

rows.label: tev066101_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask De Ezich about Ga Bewhe.

rows.label: tev066101_SEL3011
rows.name:
Ask De Ezich about the Wrothians
who have moved to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask De Ezich about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Excepting outcasts like myself, Wrothians are a rigid
bunch with nary a word to spare about anything other
than law, pride, or duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0002
rows.name:
And they may not deign to spare even that unless
Prince Jiarg has so given them leave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Still, it is not wickedness that drives them.
Try not to judge them too severely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0008
rows.name: You are human, yes? Perhaps you might oblige me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0009
rows.name:
I wish to learn more of this town of yours.
This...New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0010
rows.name:
What knowledge I do have was brought to me by the
Wrothians who raided you. They say the town is full of
life and mirth and expression.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0011
rows.name:
But I know too well that I cannot go there to see for
myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0012
rows.name:
So perhaps you could delight me with a tale or two?
What say you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0017
rows.name:
Excepting outcasts like myself, Wrothians are a rigid
bunch with nary a word to spare about anything other
than law, pride, or duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0018
rows.name:
And some zealots would even die for Prince Jiarg.
They must be out of their minds![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0019
rows.name:
I, uh... I mean... Curses! I hope my mother was not in
earshot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0020
rows.name:
If she ever heard me speak such words of the prince,
she would beat the life out of me on the spot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Can you believe it?! Wrothians and humans are on the
same side![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0026
rows.name:
The Wrothians who raided your town told me all about
New LA, and I found myself enraptured.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0027
rows.name:
My people have been left with nothing, you see.
The idea of a grand, gleaming spectacle of a town,
its myriad wonders mine to explore... Ahhhh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0028
rows.name:
But I fear I put all dreams of living there aside,
certain that my enemies would never welcome me into
their home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Praise Prince Jiarg for proving me wrong!
Now I can ready myself for the day when I join my
fellows in New LA and breathe its intoxications in![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1001
rows.name:
A fine day for me would start with a hearty meal at
Army Pizza, followed by a stroll past Belle Betty
Fashions to feast my eyes on the front lines of style.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1002
rows.name:
In the afternoon, I would duck into the Sunshine Café
for a spot of tea and people-watch as the city's many
denizens go about their own adventures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1003
rows.name:
...Surprised? Heh heh. Never thought you'd meet a
Wrothian urbanite, I wager.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1004
rows.name:
They say Earth is a hundred times more interesting
than New LA. Is this true?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1005
rows.name:
If you ever return, you must take me with you!
I just know I am meant to live there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1010
rows.name:
I have been earning my keep working at bars as a
watchman—a "bouncer," I believe you call it?
I assure you, the money doesn't go to waste! Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1011
rows.name:
Perhaps I was wrong to regard my combat training
with such derision. It has presented itself to be my
most marketable skill here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1012
rows.name:
I need to thank my mother and father for knocking
some sense into me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1013
rows.name:
A letter and a rare local jewel ought to express the
sentiment well enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1018
rows.name:
That wench? Why do you ask?
...Oh, she got you, didn't she? Poor sap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1019
rows.name:
Ga Bewhe has always been something of a
backstabber. You need eyes on the back of
your head if you plan to deal with that one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1020
rows.name:
At least you are still alive. With a treacherous woman
like her, you should consider that coming out ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG1021
rows.name:
I do not know what she is up to, but I guarantee she
has more rogue in her than I ever will in me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG2001
rows.name: What a galling question coming from you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG2002
rows.name:
If you must know, the Wrothians who went to New LA
are having the times of their lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG2003
rows.name:
They get to be a part of your thriving community,
making equipment with Six Stars or battling the
Ganglion at your side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG2004
rows.name:
The only ones left out of it all are me and washed-up
gaffers like Go Belg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG2005
rows.name:
How unjust can the fates be, leaving a young whelp as
full of potential as me to rot away in this pit?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG2010
rows.name:
My days are filled with sparring and hours of silent
reading of the Wrothian Book of Five Rings,
upon penalty of a thrashing from my mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG2011
rows.name: Is this supposed to be punishment or torture?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG2012
rows.name: You have really done it to me this time, "friend."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066101_MSG2013
rows.name:
Well, one day I will escape this hell and make my way
to New LA. Mark my words![ST:wait ]
